title: Iravingu Thevai Song Lyrics From 96 Movie
stanzas:
iravingu theevaai
nammai chooluthe
vidiyalum irulaai
varudhe.

ninaivugal theeyaai
alai modhuthe
udalingu saavaai
ezhuthe.

pirive uravaai
karainthu pogiren
uyirin uyirai
pirindhu pogiren.

malaigalin nadhipol
manam vazhinthu
vanthaai.
varandidum nilathil
pala kadalgal
thanthaai.

kanave thunaiyaai
ozhinthu pogattum.
iravingu theevaai
nammai chooluthe
vidiyalum irulaai
varudhe.

indha thaamarai
kulam meeri
thani aaguthe.
adhan sooriyan
pagalindri
veyil kaayuthe.

oru pathaiyil
iru jeevan
thunai theduthe.
ada kaalangal
thadai meeri
thadai poduthe.

nee indri naane
thinam vazhvathoru
vazhvaa..
vaazhve vaa neethaan
uyirin uyire
varavaa.. varavaa..

thinam thinam
uyirthezhum manam
andraaam maayume.
uyir varai nirainthunai
manam kondaadi vazhume

marangal sainthu
koodu veezhnthum
kuyilgal raagam
paadume.

iravu theernthu
oyntha podhum
nilavu porumai
kaakkume.

mazhai vazhi
kadal vidum
vin kaathal mannai
serume.

unai udal prindhinum
en kaadhal unnai
sernthu vazhume.
nee poi vaa vaa
